loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 50 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyuge y sus dos menores hijos en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería principalmente.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café de variedad catimore, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 15 años y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes y mano de obra para su cultivo de café, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también a tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a permitirle tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos, 50, lives in his own rustic house with his wife and two minor children in the district of Pucara, province of Jaen, Cajamarca Region in the northern mountain range of Peru.  The locals here work mainly in agriculture and livestock farming.

He works in agriculture, specifically growing Catimore variety coffee.  He has 15 years' experience in the sector and good personal and work references in his district.  The loan he will receive is to pay for farm labor costs, application and incorporation of plant treatment and fertilizers, and pay coffee crop workers.  This will help improve his crop physiologically, morphologically and productively.  It will also allow him to have an opportune harvest and greater production.  The product will be of better quality so he will not have any problem selling it, which will give him more income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: To apply plant treatments, fertilizers and hire crop workers.

loans.name: Leny

texts.en:
Leny is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy additional storage for her fish.

Leny successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Leny's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional storage for her fish.

loans.name: Arquimides

texts.es:
Arquímedes, de 27 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura, estudio hasta noveno grado, está soltero, pero sus hijos estudian en la escuela del cantón donde vive.

Arquimides, es agricultor desde muy temprana edad, este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres. 

Arquimides, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono, pesticidas y pagar mano de obra.

Arquimides, desea en un futuro darle una buena educación a sus hijos, para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Arquimedes, 27, has a ninth grade education and works in agriculture.  He is single and has children who attend school in the canton where he lives.

Arquimedes learned farming from his parents when he was very young.

The loan he needs is to buy fertlizer and pesticides, and hire workers.  He wants to give his children a good education so they can become professionals.

loans.use: To buy fertlizer and pesticides, and hire workers.

loans.name: Jose Manfredy

texts.es:
José, de 28 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura, estudio hasta octavo grado, está soltero, tiene hijos pero no está con la madre de ellos, pero si le ayuda cada mes. 

José, es agricultor desde temprana edad, este trabajo lo aprendió gracias a su padre, que fue quien se tomo el tiempo para enseñarle.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para su cultivo de maíz.

José, sueña con tener una casa de bloque o ladrillo.
texts.en:
Jose, 28, works in agriculture.  He has an eighth grade education and is single.  Although he has children he does not live with the mother, but helps her monthly.

Jose has worked in farming from an early age.  He learned the trade from his father who took the time to teach him.

He is in need of a loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides for his corn crop.  His dream is to have a brick or stone house.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides for his corn crop.

loans.name: Fredesvinda

texts.es:
Fredesvinda tiene 59 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia en una zona rural ubicada en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio principalmente.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como cerdos, gallinas, pollos, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace 3 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio de los mismos y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Fredesvinda, 59, lives in her own house with her common-law husband in a rural area of the district of Oyotun.  It is in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region on the northern coast of Peru.  The locals of this district work in agriculture, livestock farming and commerce, mainly.

She raises and sells animals such as pigs, hens, chickens, and others, and has been in business for three years, working from home.  She is requesting a loan to buy more animals to increase her stock to increase business and satisfy customer demand.  This will improve her income and the family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more animals to increase her stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, wood and nails to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria, es madre de cuatro hijos, no fue a la escuela debido a que su familia era de escasos recursos y tambien porque donde ella vivia, no existian escuelas cerca; está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura junto con ella, actualmente solo vive con su esposo, porque sus 3 hijos están acompañados y uno ya fallecio en el conflicto armado de El Salvador.

Maria, se dedico a ayudarles a sus padres en la agricultura desde que era muy pequeña, debido a que era la fuente de ingresos que tenian.- Hoy en dia, ella solo va a dejarle los alimentos a su esposo, sin embargo ella se dedica a la venta de frutas en su casa y comunidades aledañas.

Maria, utilizara el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes, semilla, herbicidas y pagara la mano de obra para que le ayuden a trabajar en los cultivos.

Maria, sueña con arreglar su casa poco a poco, ya que la vivienda en la que actualmente vive, es de adobe y el techo ya no sirve y caen goteras cuando llueve.
texts.en:
Maria had four children.  She was unable to attend school because her family could not afford it and there was no school near where she lived.  She is married and both she and her husband work together in agriculture.  They live alone because three of the children live independently and one died in the conflict in El Salvador.

Maria always helped her parents in farming when she was little since it was how they earned a living.  Nowadays, she only takes food to her husband while he works.  She sells fruit at home and in neighboring communities.

She will use the loan to buy fertilizers, seeds, herbicides and hire workers to help with the crop activity.

Her dream is to fix up the house little by little since it is made of adobe and the roof is old and leaks when it rains.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, seeds, herbicides and hire workers to help with the crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products, such as rice, sugar, beans, butter, soft drinks, churros, bread and eggs, to stock up her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweetcorn, and farming supplies such as manure, seeds, pesticides and fertilisers.

loans.name: Cesar Eduardo

texts.es: Cesar tiene 25 años de edad es soltero vive con sus padres en Guaranda Provincia de Bolivar el se dedica a la fabrica de puertas solicita el crédito para capital de trabajo para invertir en materia prima, realiza la compra a diario en Guaranda, su sueño es comprarse una casa, el aspira crecer en su negocio y en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Cesar is 25 years old and single. He lives with his parents in Guaranda, in the Bolivar province of Ecuador. Cesar makes a living making doors. He is applying for this loan in order to buy assets in the form of basic supplies. Cesar buys supplies every day in Guaranda. His dream is to buy his own house, and he aspires to expand his business. In his spare time, Cesar likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy assets.

loans.name: Sergio Antonio

texts.es:
Sergio, es padre de 2 hijos, estudio hasta séptimo grado, debido a que su familia era de escasos recursos económicos, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Sergio, se dedica a la agricultura, especificamente siembra maíz y frijoles, se dedica a esta actividad desde que tenia 14 años de edad, su papá siempre lo llevaba a trabajar las tierras que el cultivaba ya que era la única alternativa de trabajo que había en aquellos tiempos, hoy en día cultiva su propio terreno, que está ubicado aproximadamente a 2 kilómetros de su vivienda.

Sergio, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como semilla, abono y herbicidas, con la compra de estos productos espera incrementar la producción y de esta forma mejorar los ingresos para poder solventar los gastos de su familia y a la vez tener alimentos para el verano.

Sergio, desea tener en el futuro una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia, esto lo pretende lograr con la producción de  maíz y frijol que espera este año; También sueña con vivir en un lugar digno con sus hijos y ayudarles para que sigan estudiando y así verlos como profesionales.
texts.en:
Sergio only has a seventh grade education because his family could not afford more.  He has two children and his partner cares for the home.

Sergio works in agriculture, mainly growing corn and beans, which he has been doing for 14 years.  His father used to take him with him to the farm where he worked since agriculture was the only work available in those times.  Now he has his own land which is about two kilometers from home.

The loan he is requesting is to buy farm supplies such as seeds, fertilizer and herbicides.  He hopes to increase production with these products so he can improve his income to cover household expenses and have enough food for the summer.

Sergio wants a better quality of life for himself and his family in the future.  He hopes to achieve this with his corn and bean production this year.  He also dreams of living in a better place for his children and of helping them get an education and become professionals.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies such as seeds, fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Sonia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sonia, estudio hasta segundo grado, está divoriciada y no tiene pareja pero tiene tres hijos que estan estudiando. 

Sonia, no tiene negocio pero es empleada de un comedor y con su salario sostiene a sus tres hijos, porque no tiene ayuda del padre de ellos.

Sonia, necesita el crédito para comprar el derecho a agua potable, con la adquisicion de este derecho, mejora sus condiciones de vida, porque tenia que levantarse a las 4:00 a.m. para halar el agua con cantaros en la cabeza antes de irse a trabajar. 

Sus sueños son, trabajar fuerte para darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos para que estudien y se preparen academicamente, ya que es una oportunidad que ella no pudo tener.
texts.en:
Sonia studied up to second grade.  She is divorced and has three children who attend school.  

Sonia does not have a business but works at a diner and uses her salary to support her three children, since she receives no help from their father.

She is in need of a loan to buy the rights to drinking water.  By acquiring these rights she will improve her living conditions.  Now she gets up at 4:00 a.m. to haul water in jugs on her head before going to work.

Her dream is to work hard to give her children a better future so they can study and get academic training, which is something she did not have access to.

loans.use: To buy the rights to drinking water.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
O senhora Ana é comerciante de  35 anos de idade é solteira sem  filhos, vive na casa de sua mãe a quem a sustenta.
Com o valor do crédito pretende comprar peixe seco para revender no mercado local.
Tem como sonho, ter uma mini mercearia,  uma casa própria e uma viatura que irá usar como meio para transportar a sua mercadoria.
O seu maior desafio e a insuficiência de fundos, e diz ainda que com o empréstimo anterior conseguiu fazer um quarto na casa de sua mãe onde actualmente reside, e diz ainda que vai pagar pontualmente para ter acesso a outros créditos.
texts.en:
Ana is a 35-year-old businesswoman. She is single and does not have children. She maintains her mother, with whom she lives.

With the requested amount she plans to buy dried fish to resell at the local market.

Her dream is to have a small grocery store, her own house and a vehicle to transport her products.

Her biggest challenge is the lack of funding. She also says that with the previous loan she could build a room at her mother’s house, where she currently lives. She says that she will pay the loan according to plan in order to be able to apply for more loans.

loans.use: to buy dried fish to resell.

loans.name: Rina Marisol

texts.es:
Rina, vende ropa para ambos sexos, vive con su esposo y con sus tres hijos, uno está estudiando bachillerato y dos están en nivel básico; el negocio lo aprendió con el apoyo de amistades, posteriormente se animó a tener un negocio propio, no ofrecía mucha variedad en las prendas de vestir, conforme paso el tiempo logro tener un local en el mercado municipal, de trabajar en dicho lugar ya tiene 7 años y por el momento no ha tenido dificultades en hacerlo.
Comprará pantalones, blusas, camisas, ropa interior, etc., le ayudara a fortalecer su negocio con nuevos productos para atender mejor a sus clientes, espera tener nuevas ventas y mejores ingresos para cambiar su estilo de vida familiar.
Sus proyectos son ir incorporando nueva mercadería a su negocio, cancelar su deuda, mejorar su vivienda y seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Rina sells clothes for men and women. She lives with her husband and three children. One of her children is in high school and the remaining two in primary school. She learned this activity from some friends who supported her. Then, she decided to open her own business. In the beginning, she did not have many clothes to offer, but with time, she was able to get a place at the municipal market. She has been working there for seven years and has not faced any difficulties so far.

She will buy pants, blouses, shirts, underwear, etc. This loan will help her to strengthen her business with new products, and better serve her customers. She hopes to increase her sales and improve her income in order to improve her family’s living conditions.

Her plans are to widen the variety of products she sells, pay back the loan, improve her home, and continue supporting her children so that they can stay in school.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts, underwear, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Benedita

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Maputo tem 51 anos de idade, viúva mãe de 5 filhos maiores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus sobrinhos e 4 netos que vivem em sua casa.
Trabalha como Auxiliar Administrativa a mais de 16 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende adquirir uma máquina de pipocas para iniciar um negócio de venda de pipocas. Este é o seu 10º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende abrir uma barraca, uma sala de conferências e adquirir uma viatura.
texts.en:
She was born in Maputo. She is 51 years old. She is a widow and has five adult children; all of them go to school. She takes care of her nephews and nieces, and four grandchildren that live with her.

She has been working as an administrative assistant for more than sixteen years and covers the home expenses with the salary she earns.

With the requested amount, she plans to buy a popcorn machine to start selling popcorn. This is her tenth loan from Hluvuku.

In the future, she plans to open a store, an events room, and buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy a popcorn machine.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta de 38 años de edad  vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos dos niñas de 2 y  12 años y un hijo de 15 años  de edad en vivienda propia ella al igual que su esposo se han esforzado por darles lo mejor a sus hijos y darles una buena educación. Desde hace 6 años Marta se dedica  a la  venta de pupusas afuera de su casa, dicha actividad la realiza de miércoles a domingo,  además lunes y martes presta sus servicios domésticos de esta manera ayuda a llevar el sustento diario para sus hijos. La cocina  de Marta se encuentra en la  sala de su vivienda, lo que representa un peligro para su hija más pequeña que ya aprendió a caminar, teme que ella pueda tener un accidente, es por ello que está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, hierro, arena, grava y piedra para construir un cuarto para la cocina, el espera contar con el financiamiento para empezar la construcción de inmediato y ya no preocuparse por la seguridad de su pequeña hija.
texts.en: Marta is 38 years old and lives with her husband and three children, two girls aged 2 to 12 years and a 15 year old son, in her own home. She and her husband have worked hard to give their children the best and to provide them with a good education. For the past 6 years Marta has made a living selling pupusas (stuffed tortillas) outside her home. She works from Wednesday to Sunday and on Monday and Tuesdays she does the household chores. In this way she helps to provide the daily bread for their children. Marta's kitchen is in the living room of her house, which is a danger to her youngest daughter who has recently learned to walk. She is afraid that she might have an accident, which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase cement, iron, sand, gravel and stone to build a room for cooking. She hopes to have the finance to begin construction immediately and no longer have to worry about the safety of her young daughter.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, sand, gravel and stone to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Jose Amilcar

texts.es:
Amilcar, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y vive con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, también vive con ellos su suegra.
	
Amilcar, trabaja en una venta de pizza como repartidor, desde hace tres años, fue recomendado por un amigo en la empresa y fue así como logro entrar a laborar; él viaja de lunes a sábado 5 kilómetros de su casa a su trabajo y su horario es de 11:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m.

Amílcar, necesita el dinero del crédito para reparar su vivienda, específicamente mejorar el techo y el piso de su vivienda.

El sueño principal de Amílcar, es ver crecer a su hijo y que se convierta en todo un profesional y forme una familia.
texts.en:
Amilcar is 25 years old and studied up until through ninth grade. He is married and lives with his wife and young son. His wife does the household chores. His mother-in-law also lives with them.

Amilcar has worked as a pizza deliveryman. This job was recommended to him by his friend in the company and that's how he got the job . He travels 5 kilometers from his home to work from Monday to Saturday, and he works from 11:00 am to 7:00 pm.

Amílcar needs the loan to repair his house. Specifically, he would like to improve the roof and floor.  

Amilcar's main dream is to see his son grow up, become a professional and raise a family.

loans.use: to repair the roof and floor of his home.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: María es una mujer emprendedora que a sus 36 años de edad se dedica a la venta de pan dulce y pan francés, en una zona de mucha afluencia de turistas, por lo que sus ventas son muy buenas, lo que le permite brindar lo mejor que está en sus manos a sus hijos. María vive en casa de su propiedad desde hace 5 años, junto a sus hijas de 16 y 18 años de edad y su esposo. La vivienda de María fue construida en un terreno con muchos relieves, por lo que ha decidido construir un muro de retención que le permita proteger su vivienda de cualquier derrumbe, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, piedra, grava y mano de obra para construir un muro de retención que brinde protección a su vivienda y su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is an enterprising woman who at 36 years of age makes a living selling sweet bread products and French bread. She sells in an area with a large number of tourists, so her sales are very good, allowing her to provide her children with the best that she can. 

Maria has lived in her own home for 5 years, along with her daughters who are 16 and 18 years old and her husband. Maria's house was built on hilly land, so she has decided to build a retaining wall to protect her home from any landslides. As a result, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, stone, gravel and labor in order to build the wall to provide protection for her home and her family.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, stone, gravel and labor to build a retaining wall to protect her home.

loans.name: Catarino

texts.es: Don Catarino de 51 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador el se dedica desde hace 15 años al cultivo de maíz y frijoles inicio con capital propio y como todo campesino pone mucho empeño a su trabajo para poder sacar una buena cosecha y luego ponerla a la venta y de esta forma poder sacar los ingresos necesarios para su hogar, el está solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para invertir en abono, herbicidas, fertilizantes, controles de plagas para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles y así continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Don Catarino, 51 years old, is a hard-working man. He has worked in the cultivation of corn and beans for 15 years. He began by using his own resources and, true to the nature of a farmer, puts all his efforts into his work in order to get a good harvest, which he then puts on the market. This is how he is able to earn the income necessary for his home.

He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in manure, herbicides, fertilizers, and pest control so that he can continue his work growing corn and beans, which is his only source of income.

loans.use: invest in manure, herbicides, fertilizers, and pest control

loans.name: Jose Fredy

texts.es:
Fredy, de 22 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañado vive con hijo y su pareja que se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Fredy, se dedica a la pesca artesanal, él se ha dedicado a esto desde hace 8 años, fue con su padre como aprendió este oficio; le gusta tanto que decidió convertirlo en su principal fuente de ingresos; él viaja hasta la playa que está a 5 kilómetros de su casa, todos los días con su padre.

Fredy, solicita el crédito para comprar redes y mejorar su equipo de pesca, esto ayudara a que su equipo este al 100% y sea más productivo, para poder generar mejores ingresos.

El sueño de Fredy, es ver crecer a su hijo y darle una mejor calidad de vida y también sueña con tener más de dos equipos de pesca para mejorar su producción.
texts.en:
Fredy is 22 years old. He went to school up to the ninth grade. He is married and lives with his son and wife, who takes care of the home.

Fredy is an artisanal fisherman. He has done this for 8 years. He learned this trade from his father. He likes it so much it has become his main source of income. He travels to a beach that is 5 kilometers from his house every day with his father. 

Fredy is asking for the loan to buy nets and improve his fishing equipment. This will help him have his equipment at 100% and be more productive to generate more income.

Fredy's dream is to watch his son grow up and give him a better quality of life. He also dreams of having more two more pieces of fishing equipment to improve his production.

loans.use: to buy nets and improve his fishing equipment.

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es: Carlos de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de güisquil desde hace 3 años inicio con capital propio comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y es así como el puede llevar el sustento a su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de de abono, fertilizantes y controles de plagas para poder tener una buena cosecha y así poder seguir con sus ventas ara tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Carlos is 41 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and two children. He has grown guisquil squash for 3 years. He started with his own capital and sells his products in the neighboring towns. That is how he supports his home. He is asking for a loan to buy compost, fertilizer and pest control in order to have a good harvest and continue with his sales to get better profits.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer and pest control.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
Porfirio tiene 40 años de edad, es casado, tiene cinco hijos, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa en el distrito de Cañaris, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café de variedad catimore, cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en el rubro de la agricultura y además se desempeña como peón agricola, cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con esto el espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Porfirio is 40 years old. He is married and has five children. He lives in his own house with his wife in the Cañaris district. It is a community dedicated to agriculture, ranching and raising animals. It is located in the province of  Ferreñafe, Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

He works in agriculture and has catimore coffee crop. He has more than 15 years' experience in agriculture and also works a farm laborer. He has very good work and personal references in his district. He will use the loan to buy compost and fertilizer to do maintenance on his coffee crop. With this, he hopes to offer better quality coffee to his customers, which will have a positive impact on his income level, which will allow him to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer to do maintenance on his coffee crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood and nails to repair the roof of his home.

loans.name: Olympia

texts.en:
Olympia is a 53-year-old married woman with 9 children, two of whom are in school. 

She is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Olympia has been in this business for 3 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Rano

texts.en:
Rano is a generous woman. She was born in northern part of Tajikistan in 1973 and she is living in small town with her family. She is married and has two children. Her husband is an emigrant and she has 25 years of experience working at a secondary school. 

Her children are getting an education at institutes. She wants to ensure her children receive an education at higher education institutes. Recently, she has not had the money to pay her child’s tuition fees. She does not want to admit to her children that they were expelled from the university. She is asking for a loan from IMON and Kiva lenders to pay her child’s higher education costs. She hopes to be sustained.

loans.use: to pay her child’s higher education costs.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 55 years old and married.

She is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Carmelita has been in this business for 3 years now, and has borrowed once in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise  her livestock.

loans.name: Sri Cendana Group

texts.en:
The Sri Cendana group have succeeded in making their payment to MUK on time. Managed by Ni Ketut as the head, they collect the money and give it to the staff of MUK, witnessed by other members and the board of the group. They share their story when they keep the pigs. Most of the members sold their pigs together to the big buyer and they earned a satisfactory profit. They take good care of the pigs by giving them nutritious feed and vitamins. Now the result is as they expected: they can make a saving and fulfil the families' needs.

To increase their income and savings, the group agreed to continue the loan. They want to buy more piglets, especially superior quality piglets to make sure they get a higher price when they sell them later. 

Ni Ketut is a housewife with 2 adult children. They are both already married and Ni Ketut lives only with her husband who works as farmer. Her primary jobs is keeping the pigs at home and she also helps her husband work in the garden. Ni Ketut has a dream to renovate her kitchen and her house. She will use the profit from her pigs business to make it come true. Ni Ketut will use her portion of loan to purchase superior piglets and feed.

loans.use: to buy superior piglets and feed.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a buy and sell coconut shell business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy more coconut shells to sell.

Carmelita has been in this business for 25 years. Carmelita earns more income from pig fattening.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Carmelita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more coconut shells to sell

loans.name: Burul

texts.ru: Бурул, 42 года, в разводе. У нее высшее образование, занимается сельским хозяйством. На сегодня у Бурул есть 5 овец, 3 коровы, на 1,0 Га арендованной и 0,50 Га собственной земли она выращивает ячмень для реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль  от бизнеса Бурул составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Доходы от бизнеса Бурул старается вкладывать в развитие бизнеса. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошадей для откорма их на пастбище. Доходы от кредита Бурул будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие дела и покупку автомобиля.
texts.en: Burul is 42 years old. She is divorced. She has a higher education and she is a farmer. At present Burul has five sheep and three cows, and she grows barley for sale on 1.0 hectare of rented and 0.5 hectares of her own land. The monthly profit from Burul's business is about 15,000 som (KGS). Burul tries to invest the proceeds of the business in its development. She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy horses for fattening at pasture. Burul will invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business and buying a car.

loans.use: to buy horses to fatten at pasture and increase her herd.

loans.name: Noreen

texts.en:
Noreen is 33 years old and is married. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (who is also shown in the photo) at the corner of her house. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts there over the years. 

She is a mother of seven children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing, and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR  to buy packs of salts, biscuits, rice, spices and juices to handle the increasing demands of her customers efficiently to get a boost in her earnings so she can expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits, rice, spices and juices to handle the increasing demands of her customers efficiently

loans.name: Vet

texts.en:
Vet is 35 years old, married, and lives in a community in the province of Kampong Speu in Cambodia. For over the past nine years, Vet has run a business selling peanuts and clams. 

Her husband is a 36-year-old construction worker and her oldest child works as a waitress. The family can make approximately USD23 each day. Vet is now requesting a Kiva loan through Kredit MFI for her husband to buy construction tools to use in his construction work. 

This is her second loan cycle with Kiva. With the loan, her husband will have enough tools for his work to earn income to support the family. In the future, she is going to help her children in earning their high school diplomas, and she also wants to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy construction tools for her husband to use in his construction work

loans.name: Oyatulloh

texts.en:
Oyatulloh is a bright guy. He was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1996. He is living in a small town with his family. He is single. He is a student.

He is studying full time. He is active in his classes and well known among friends. 

His father works abroad and his mother is a farmer. They rent land for doing business. 

Oyatulloh has a dream to be educated, get a good job, and ensure his parents are taken care of. He appealed to IMON and Kiva's lenders to pay his higher education costs. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay his higher education costs

loans.name: Zulolahon

texts.en:
Zulolahon is a cheerful woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1986. She is living in a small town with her family. She is married and has three children. Her husband is an emigrant. 

For almost five years, she has been keeping livestock at home for her job. She appealed to IMON asking for help to pay her sister’s university tuition fees. She wishes to help her sister to be educated and get her higher education degree.  She awaits Kiva lenders' compassion.

loans.use: to pay her sister’s university tuition fee

loans.name: Darwin

texts.en:
This is Darwin, 42, a resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. He is married to Gemma who manages their household and takes care of their three children. He works to provide for his family’s daily personal and household needs.

Darwin operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a 5 PHP worth of cooking oil, or an egg. He earns money by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. His store is located adjacent to his house. Darwin has a charming personality and so people prefer to buy at his store. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of 2,000 PHP in sales every day. 

To help him continue the operation of his business he is requesting a 60,000 PHP loan which he will use to buy grocery items such as sacks of rice, canned goods, biscuits, instant noodles, sugar, cooking oil, beverages and school supplies to sell at his store. He also retails lots of prepaid mobile phones. He is positive this will boost his income as he expands his business. He is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to him.

Darwin aims to grow his business to give his family a better life. He wants to give his children the best education possible. He faithfully meets up with the co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and here he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, beverages and school supplies to sell at his small general store.

loans.name: Raihan

texts.ru: Райхан, 49 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, на сегодняшний день занимается полеводством и животноводством, в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, а на 4,50 Га она выращивает картофель и морковь для реализации, есть яблоневый сад, в год получают до 20 тонн яблок для продажи. Бизнес начала с 12,000 сом (KGS) в 1995 году. Благодаря непосильному труду, Райхан достигла хороших успехов, ее прибыль 24,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для обработки почвы и выращивания экологически-чистых овощей и яблок. Доходы от кредита Райхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своей деятельности.
texts.en: Raihan is 49 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She has as secondary education. At present she grows crops and rears animals. She has four cows, and grows potatoes and carrots for sale on 4.5 hectares. She has an apple orchard and gets up to twenty tonnes of apples for sale each year. She started the business with 12,000 som (KGS) in 1995. Thanks to back-breaking work, Raihan has achieved good success and her profit is 24,000 som (KGS) per month. She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer to treat her land and grow organic vegetables and apples. Raihan plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to treat her land and grow organic vegetables and apples.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 59 years old and married with eight children.  With one child in school, Nida works very hard to provide for them.

Nida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Nida has been in this business for 13 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, canned goods, and other groceries. 

In the future, Nida would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 57 years old and married with eight children. Two of her children are still in school. Teresa works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell like candies, milk, drinks, canned goods, noodles, etc.

Teresa has been in this business for one year.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell like candies, milk, drinks, canned goods, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 42 years old and married with one child, who is still in school. Daisy works very hard to provide for her family.

Daisy runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell like candies, milk, drinks, canned goods, noodles, etc.

Daisy has been in this business for one year.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell like candies, milk, drinks, canned goods, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Melindy

texts.en:
Melindy is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Melindy is 46 years old and has one child still in school.

Melindy has a fishing business in the Philippines. Melindy requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing materials like fish net, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business.

Melindy has been in this business for two years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like fish net, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business

loans.name: Roxana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Roxana tiene 23 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio principalmente.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, entre otros, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más animales así como alimento balanceado para los mismos, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, ella espera incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le va a permitir incrementar sus ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Roxana is 23 years old. She is married and has 2 children. She lives with her family in the district of Oyotún in a rural area that can be found located in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Perú. The people who live in this district make a living mainly in agriculture, livestock and commerce. 

Roxana makes a living raising and selling animals such as ducks, hens, roosters, and chickens, among others. She has more than 3 years experience in this business. Her business is located in her own home. She is asking for a loan to buy more animals and balanced feed for them. This investment will serve to bring her a greater variety and productivity of animals. She hopes to increase her animal stock to be able to meet the diverse tastes and necessities of the clients in the area. This will allow her to increase her income and thus better the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy more animals and balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Ma. Cheryll

texts.en:
Ma. Cheryll is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Ma. Cheryll is 38 years old and has three children who are in school.

Ma. Cheryll has a general store business in the Philippines. Ma. Cheryll requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stocks of items to sell like canned goods, diapers, sardines, and other personal care products.

Ma. Cheryll has been in this business for five years. In the future, Ma. Cheryll would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of items to sell like canned goods, diapers, sardines, and other personal care products.

loans.name: Racel

texts.en:
Racel is 28 years old and married with four children. Two children are currently in school, and Racel works very hard to provide for them.

Racel runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, and personal care products.

Racel has been in this business for one year.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, and personal care products

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is 37 years old and married with one child who is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Sharon has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as canned good, snack food and other personal care products. 

In the future she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Aziya

texts.ru: Азия, 50 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей- сына- студента и дочери - школьницы. У Азии среднее образование. В поиске доходов для своей семьи она стала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Бизнес начала с 20 лет назад. Благодаря ее непосильному труду Азия достигла больших успехов и получает прибыль в сумме около 9,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На сегодняшний день у Азии есть 8 овец и 2 коровы, на участке мерою 2,0 Га собственной земли она выращивает люцерну и ячмень для реализации. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. Азия обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого домашнего молока. Доходы от кредита Азия планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своей деятельности, она хочет накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Aziya is 50 years old, married, and the mother of two children. Her son is a student and her daughter is a school pupil. Aziya has a secondary education. In search of income for her family, she began rearing animals and growing crops. She started her business 20 years ago. Thanks to her back-breaking work, Aziya has achieved great success and gets a profit of about 9,000 som (KGS) per month. At present Aziya has eight sheep and two cows, and she grows alfalfa and barley for sale on a 2.0 hectare plot of her own land. She sells milk on a daily basis. Aziya has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a dairy cow to increase her volume of sales of organic home-produced milk. Aziya plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her activities, and she wants to save up to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase her volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, wood and nails for the galley of the kitchen.

loans.name: Bienvenida

texts.en:
Bienvenida is thankful that she was granted a 35,000 PHP loan which she used to buy spare parts needed in her repair shop. Through her earnings she is able to send her child to school and meet their daily living expenses.

She would now like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan which she will use to pay for other spare parts for refrigerators and air conditioners needed for her appliance repair shop. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment and the financial help that will be given her, for it will greatly help in sending her child to school.

Bienvenida hopes to serve more clients. She prays that God will bless the works of her hands and live a better life. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies .

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for appliances and other materials needed in her appliance-repair business.

loans.name: Jose Cristobal

texts.es:
Jose tiene 64 años de edad, es casado, vive con su esposa en casa familiar en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Cayalti, una comunidad dedicada a la crianza de animales y comercio que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la fabricación de estructuras metálicas como puertas, ventanas, rejas, entre otras, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 15 meses y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de materiales para la fabricación de las estructuras metálicas, de esta manera el espera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José is 64 years old, married and lives with his wife in their family home in a large community of the Cayaltí urban area. The people make a living in breeding animals and trade in this community in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region of Peru’s northern coast.

José himself makes a living producing metal structures, such as doors, windows, bars and more. He has been doing this work for more than 15 months and has good personal and professional references locally. 

José is applying for this loan in order to buy to buy a larger quantity of materials to make metal structures. He hopes that this will allow him to expand his business further, and to earn a higher income and improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of materials to make metal structures.

loans.name: Madina

texts.en:
Madina is a cheerful woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1984. She is living in a remote district with her family. She is married and has three children. 

She is a third year student. She is an excellent student at classes. She is able to keep household and at the same time to study. She is a careful mother and an active student at classes. 

It is her first time asking a loan from IMON and she hopes to be supported. She requested a loan to pay her higher education costs.

loans.use: to pay her higher education costs

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is a 48-year-old married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested an 11,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fishing materials like a fishing net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other fishing materials.

Rita has been in this business for 1 year. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing materials like a fishing net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other fishing materials.

loans.name: Arys Enrique

texts.es: Arys es un microempresario de 40 años de edad, cuya idea de negoció nació por la propuesta que le hizo un familiar que trabaja en una clínica veterinaria; le sugirió que elaborara camas para caninos.  Consultó con su cónyuge a quien le pareció una muy buena oportunidad para iniciar su propio negocio y compró todo lo necesario para realizar la producción.  Hoy en día lleva un año en esta actividad y cuenta con una lista amplia de clientes a quienes les ofrece sus productos de contado o a crédito según su flujo de efectivo y para poder responder a sus pedidos requiere de una inyección de capital para ello está aplicando a su primer Credikiva, por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la compra al por mayor de tela anti fluido, esponja, plástico e hilos.  Con esta inversión pretende tener mayor rentabilidad puesto que obtendrá descuentos al realizar sus compras al por mayor.  Arys es padre de tres hijos menores de edad a quienes desea ofrecer mejores condiciones de vida y por ello su meta familiar es remodelar su vivienda.  En su negocio desea prosperar y comprar otras máquinas que le permitan tener otras operarias para ampliar su cobertura.
texts.en:
Arys is a 40 year old small-business owner whose business idea was born from a proposal that a relative who works in a veterinary clinic made to him. He suggested that he make dog beds. Arys discussed it with his wife who thought it was a very good opportunity for him to begin his own business and he bought everything he needed for production. 
It's now been a year since he started this job and he has an extensive list of clients to whom he offers his products by cash or card depending on his cash flow. To be able to respond to his orders, he needs a boost of money which is why he is applying for his first Credikiva, through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will invest it in buying waterproof cloth, sponges, plastic and thread. With this investment, he aims to have a higher profitability since he will get discounts from making his wholesale purchases.
Arys is the father of three young children, to whom he wants to offer better living conditions. For that reason his family goal is to remodel his home. In his business, he hopes to prosper and to buy other machines that allow him to have other operatives and expand his coverage.

loans.use: to buy waterproof cloth, sponges, plastic and thread at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Estalin Damian

texts.es: Estalin tiene 25 años es soltero vive con sus padresen Guaranda, se dedica a la construcción de casas, solicita el crédito para la compra de un electrodomestico realizara la compra el un almacen en Guaranda su sueño es comprarse una contructora y tener una familia numerosa, en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Estalin is 25 years old and single. He lives with his parents in Guaranda and makes a living building houses. He is applying for this loan in order to buy an electrical appliance. He will make his purchase at a store in Guaranda. Estalin’s dream is to buy a construction company and to have a big family. Estalin likes to play sports in his spare time.

loans.use: to buy an electrical appliance.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a 52-year-old married woman with seven children, two of whom are presently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Marilyn has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years. 

Marilyn requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fishing materials like fish net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing materials like fish net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools, spare parts, tyres, and brake shoes for her son's motorbike repair workshop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new cosmetics products such as facial cream, bleach cream, nail polish, hair color, and lotion for her beauty parlor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in metal sheets, wood, nails and wire to change his house's roof and protect his son.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 52 years old and married with five children, one of whom is in school.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Cecilia is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and pay for her laborer.

Cecilia has been farming sugarcane for ten years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for her laborer.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en:
Candelaria works hard to support her family. Candelaria is single and has a peanut butter making business in the Philippines.

Candelaria requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like peanuts, sugar, cooking oil and other materials for her food production business.

Candelaria has been in this business for 5 years now, and also earns additional income from buying and selling frozen foods.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like peanuts, sugar, cooking oil and other materials for her food production business.

loans.name: Nelson Enrrique

texts.es: Nelson, tiene 29 años de edad, está casado, tiene un hijo, reside en una aldea del municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Barbara junto a su esposa e hijo. Desde hace 7 años cultiva granos básicos como maíz, frijoles y café el cual vende en la misma zona. Nelson está solicitando un préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y darle buen mantenimiento a su finca de café para poder sacar mejor cosecha este año.  Su sueño es crecer como agricultor en la producción de café de calidad.
texts.en:
Nelson is 29 years old, he is married and has a child. He lives with his wife and son in a village of the municipality of Azacualpa, in Santa Barbara. 

He earns a living cultivating basic grains, such as corn, beans and coffee, which he sells in the same zone. He's been doing this work for seven years.

He is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers to keep his coffee plantation well maintained and obtain a better harvest this year. 

Nelson's dream is to develop as a farmer and produce high quality coffee.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to maintain his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es: Mario de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, el se dedica a la venta de madera desde hace 10 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo una pared donde muestra la fotografía pero como no tiene de suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra para tener una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Mario, 39, owns a house where he lives with his life partner and his son. He has been selling wood for ten years. With the profits he makes from his sales, he manages to cover some of the home expenses.

He wants to make some home improvements by building a wall (the picture shows where). However, he does not have enough money, so he is requesting a loan to buy cement, sand, bricks and iron, and to pay for the labor needed to have a dignified home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks and iron, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Gaybullo

texts.ru: Гайбулло мужчина 37 лет. Женат. Заботливый отец троих детей. У него среднее образование. Он хотел поступить в ВУЗ. Но так как он был старшим ребенком в семье должен был помогать отцу содержать семью. Поэтому после окончание средней школы он начал искать работу. Но отец советовал ему, чтобы он занялся животноводством. Паслушев советов отца он начал свой бизнес. Купил скот выращивал и перепродал. После того как они поженились жена тоже начала помогать мужу. Как мы знаем в рыночной экономики все стремиться зарабатывать по больше. После того как он женился расходы Гайбулло удвоились. И он не смог полностью покрыть все свои расходы. И начал как дополнительный доход заняться выращиванием кормы для скота. Начиная со второй половины прошлого года но начал получать хороший урожай. Что хватить ему откармливать больше десяти голов скота на целый период. В этом ему помогает жена и дети.  Таким образом сэкономив свои деньги Гайбулло хотел увеличить объем поголовье скота и расширить свой бизнес. Но на те деньги он экономил можно купить не больше трех голов скота. А Гайбулло хочет купить шесть голов крупно рогатого скота. С этой целью он обратился в Арванд за помощь. На полученный кредит  Гайбулло покупает крупно рогатый скот и увеличить объем свой бизнес. Он благодарен МДО “Арванд” за поддержкой и развитие его бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gaybullo is a 37-year-old man. He is married. He is the caring father of three children. He has a secondary education. He wanted to apply to university, but since he was the eldest child in the family he had to help his father support the family. So after graduating from secondary school he started looking for a job, but his father advised him to rear animals. Having listened to his father, he started his own business. He bought some cattle, raised them, and resold them. After he got married, his wife also began helping her husband.

As it is known, everyone strives to earn as much as possible in a market economy. After he got married, Gaybullo's outgoings doubled and he was not able to completely cover all of his expenses. He started growing livestock feed for additional income. He began getting a good harvest from the second half of last year sufficient for him to feed more then ten heads of cattle for a whole period. His wife and children help him with this. Having saved his money in this way, Gaybullo wanted to increase the size of his herd and expand his business. But he can buy no more than three heads of cattle with the money that he has saved, and Gaybullo wants to buy six heads of cattle. With this aim he has applied to Arvand for help. Gaybullo is buying cattle with the received loan, and increasing the size of his business. He is grateful to MDO Arvand for its support and the development of his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Gladis Margarita

texts.es: Gladis de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su de esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 25 años comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Gladis  está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono, semillas, fertilizante etc. Y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Gladis is 37 years old, and lives in her own home with her husband and son.  She has made a living in agriculture for 25 years.  She sells her products in the areas surrounding where she lives.  With what she makes from her sales she is able to cover some of the household expenses.  

Gladis is requesting a loan in order to buy organic compost, seed, fertilizer, etc. and thus be able to get a better income.

loans.use: to buy organic compost, seed, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanzied sheets, wood, and nails to change the roof of her home.

loans.name: Rudy Ernesto

texts.es: Rudy de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijoles y maicillo desde hace 18 años inicio con capital propio, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, Rudy está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono, herbicida, semillas, fertilizante etc. y así seguir con sus cultivos para  poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Rudy is 34 years old and he lives in his own home with his wife and three children. 

He earns a living cultivating corn, beans, and millet. He started this business 18 years ago with his own capital, and he sells the produce in the neighboring areas.

Rudy is applying for a loan to buy compost, herbicides, seeds, fertilizers and more to continue farming and obtain better income.

loans.use: to buy compost, herbicides, seeds, fertilizers and more.

loans.name: Saidahon

texts.en:
Saidahon is a generous woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1993. She is living in small town with her family. She is married and has two children. Her husband is working in Korea. 

She is an entrepreneur and does business of buying and selling fruits and vegetables. She likes her business very much and almost has regular customers. She has six years of practice trading fruits and vegetables. 

She appealed to IMON and Kiva lenders to buy fruits and vegetables with her working capital. She hopes to be supported. Doing business helps her to care for her children until her husband sends money.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Marivel

texts.en:
Marivel is 25 years old, single and has two children.

Marivel is in the agricultural business, raising poultry in the Philippines. She has been in this business for seven years now and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Marivel requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her chickens.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bales of shoes and clothes.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijas, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo tiene 20 años de experiencia en la actividad, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, herbicida, abonos, fertilizantes etc. y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Matilde is 48 years old and she lives in her own home with her husband and three daughters.

She earns a living growing corn and millet. She has twenty years of experience in this work, and she sells the produce in the neighboring areas. With this income, she is able to cover some of the household expenses.

Matilde is applying for a loan to buy seeds, herbicides, compost, fertilizers, and more to maintain the crops and obtain better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, herbicides, compost, fertilizers and more.

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.en:
Eusebia is 46 years old, married, and has five children, three of whom are in school.

Eusebia is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She has been farming vegetables for nine years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Eusebia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

In the future, Eusebia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies..

loans.name: Nilfa

texts.en:
Nilfa is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a used-clothing business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from running a general store and raising livestock.

Nilfa is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF in order to buy more used clothing to sell to customers.

Nilfa has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to fix her husband's lathe machine and to buy cutting tools for him

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in raw materials to prepare cakes, sodas, waters and sweets etc.

loans.name: Hiba

texts.en:
Hiba is a 31 year old married woman. She lives with her husband and two children. In order to help her husband financially and enhance her family way of living, she opened her own shop for selling clothes and shoes in 2011 and provides her customers with the best products at fair prices. She is satisfied with what she has attained so far, even though she wishes to develop her work even more. 

Today, she is seeking a loan from Kiva Partner Vitas s.a.l to buy a new collection of clothing and shoes to meet the needs of her clients in order to increase her income. She is very proud of her business growth and she hopes to enlarge her shop in the future.

loans.use: to buy a new collection of clothing and shoes

loans.name: Melvin

texts.en:
Melvin is married and has children. He buys fish from fishermen and sells in the market. He works hard and saves little by little to acquire a fishing boat in the near future. He knows that he could earn more profit if he owned a fishing boat because he could do the fishing himself, and his wife, Ritzel who is currently unemployed, could do the selling. It’s husband-and-wife partnership that will realize their dream house and will complete their children’s education.

Melvin requested a loan for 16,000 PHP, which he will use to buy more varieties of fish in bigger quantities. He can supply more consumers in their community and nearby areas. It will also augment his buying power in the approaching rainy season when fish are scarce and expensive. 

Melvin is committed to CCT Credit Cooperative’s vision to alleviate poverty and he regularly meets with his co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of his life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and God. 

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase more varieties of fish

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 47 years old and married.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Gina has been farming vegetables for ten years and she earns additional income from a general store.

Gina is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is 46 years old and married. She has four children. With one child in school, Juditha works very hard to provide for them.

Juditha runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as soap, canned goods, diapers and other groceries.

Juditha requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

In the future, Juditha would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita, 52, is a married woman with six children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Anita has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 25 years.

Anita requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store.

In the future, Anita would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store.

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.en:
Dilfuza is a brave woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1971. She is living in a remote district with her family. She is married and has a child. 

She is doing business in agriculture. She keeps livestock and plants cereals in her yard. It is her only source of income to feed her family. She hopes to save up money and build a new house.

She has an agricultural tractor that she uses to cultivate and harvest. The agricultural tractor is broken and Dilfuza needs to repair it to continue her activity. She appealed to IMON asking help to get a loan to repair the tractor. She awaits Kiva lenders' compassion.

loans.use: To repair her agricultural tractor.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 25-year-old married father of two, who has been working as a six-wheel driver in a construction company for five years. He is working hard to improve his family's living conditions, especially his children's education.
He has a limited monthly salary; his income is barely enough to cover his family's living needs thus he can't afford any sudden additional requests.
Ibrahim works hard to provide his children with the best education, thus for this reason he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay for his children's increasing school tuition fees.
He is working hard to start his own business in the future, through buying a taxi driver license and working for his own benefit.

loans.use: to pay for his children's increasing school tuition fees.

loans.name: Layale

texts.en:
Layale is a 25 year old Lebanese single women living with her parents and two siblings. She has worked as a private teacher in her house for three years, in order to help her father financially and work in parallel as a teacher in a local school. She chooses this profession because she feels that she is helping students to get the needed education. 

Today, she is applying to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to buy new equipment such as boards, notebooks, to help in her work and to improve her teaching skills. She is very optimistic about her future and wishes to receive more students with the coming school season.

loans.use: to buy new education equipment, such as boards, notebooks for her students

loans.name: Concordia

texts.en:
Concordia works hard to support her family. Concordia is married and has a buy and sell dried coconut meat business in the Philippines.

Concordia requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell.

Concordia has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Concordia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 43 years old and married. She has one child who is in school. Analiza works very hard to provide for the family.

Analiza runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 12 years and sells a variety of items such as bread, soft drinks, canned goods, noodles and other groceries. 

Analiza requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

In the future, Analiza would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, 46, is a married woman with four children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Josephine has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years.

Josephine requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Charito

texts.en:
Charito works hard to support her family. She is married with five children and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Charito requested a 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for 5 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is married with five children and a member of Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc.   

Josie support the family through her manicure services business in the Philippines.

She took an educational loan for her daughter Jossive, 16 years old and is 2nd of 5 children in the family, who is studying Bachelor of Science in Information Technology and is currently in the 1st of this 4 year course.

Teresita is borrowing Php 7,400 to pay for tuition fees of her daughter, Jossive for the First Semester of the school year 2015-2016.

Jossive plans when she graduates to help her parents earn an income to send her brother and sister in college.

loans.use: to pay 1st semester college tuition fees for her daughter's B.Sc. in IT

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita is 57 years old and married with three children. 

Perlita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Perlita requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Perlita has been raising pigs for 6 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Perlita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Lynn

texts.en:
Lynn is a hardworking female entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like farming sugarcane.

Lynn dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Germania Patricia

texts.es:
Germania es una señora de 34 años, vive junto a su hija y una tía en la ciudad de Santo Domingo, un sector conocido por ser muy comercial. 
Germania es una señora muy trabajadora, actualmente tiene una tienda en una vía principal de la Coop 16 de Marzo, es muy conocida porque brinda una buena atención; lleva cuatro años con el negocio ya que al tener a una hija sin su padre a lado le ha tocado salir adelante sola, apoyarla en su educación y darle la alimentación y vestimenta. Ahora Germania quiere aprovechar el espacio que tiene en su domicilio y adecuar un cyber ya que en este sector no existe ninguno de estos negocios y es muy bueno porque hay varias escuelas por el sector.
Germania cuenta con un pequeño ahorro para empezar, además cuenta con dos computadoras en buen estado, pero le hace faltan más para poder iniciar, por ello con el crédito otorgado por Fundación Alternativa y por el proyecto KIva ella podrá adecuar el local, comprar máquinas y sus respectivos modulares. Se siente agradecida y feliz por la confianza deposita en ella, está muy segura de mejorar sus ingresos y apoyar a los estudiantes del sector.
texts.en:
Germania is a 34 year old woman who lives with her daughter in the city of Santo Domingo, an area well knows for its business. She is a very hard working woman, she currently has a shop on a private road Coop 15 de Marzo, it is well known for for the good attention it receives. 
Germania has spent 4 years running the business since having her daughter without the father, and she has been able to succeed on her own, support her child's education and provide food and clothing. 
Now she wants to make the most of the space which she has at home and adapt to the cyber age since there are none of these businesses of this nature in her area, it is very good because there are various schools in the area. 

Germania relied on a small amount of savings to begin, also she relied on two computers in good condition, but she is missing more things in order to be able to start.Therefore with the loan awarded by Alternative Foundation and the Kiva project, she well able to adapt to the local area, purchase machines and their respective other parts.
She is thankful for and happy for the trust placed in her, she is very confident of improving her earning and helping the local students.
