Shodi has applied to MDO Arvand for support, and hopes to receive a loan. With the money he receives, Shodi wants to buy feed for his livestock and a pair of cattle.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and two head of cattle.

loans.name: Luz De Amor Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LUZ DE AMOR” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Brigida es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de artesanías en madera, venta de frutas, venta de prendas de vestir de lana para niños, venta de mantillas, venta de flores, venta de salchipapa, venta de mantas y venta de lana. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Brigida es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de artesanías en madera; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años su esposo. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de madera por mayor) que adquirirá de las barracas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente, a la elaboración,  lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada  y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que brinda la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Luz de Amor" ["Light of Love"] will start the third round in Pro Mujer [Pro Woman] as part of the Focal Center of Collpani, which is composed of eight members and is headed by a Board of Directors of which Brigida is the President. Businesses that members of the communal bank are engaged in are varied and include the sale of: wooden handicrafts, fruit, woolen garments for children, blankets, flowers, salchipapa [a dish made of sausage and french fries], and woolen blankets.

The loan they will take out will benefit this group of small micro-entrepreneurs of which Brigida is a part. She points out that she joined Pro Mujer through the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. Today she has a business selling wooden handicrafts that she started several years ago with her husband.

The loan she is taking out now is for increasing her capital (purchasing wood wholesale), which she'll acquire from the barracks of the city of El Alto. After production she will market the pieces in her retail space. This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family financially, since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the training provided by the institution.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale wood.

loans.name: Tujina Group

texts.fr:
Suite au revenu faible de l'enseignement, Dogale y a renoncé et a décidé de s'intéresser à la culture du riz et d'autres produits vivriers. Après 40 d'expérience, elle se contente de cette activité qui constitue les poumons économiques de sa famille. Les problèmes d'ordre financier ralentissent le financement de travaux champêtres; mais au regard du prêt bénéficié, elle compte élargir la superficie de champs cultivés afin de voir comment accroître ses revenus et répondre sans difficulté au vécu quotidien. 
Présidente du groupe TUJINA, elle tient dans ses mains un carnet sur la photo.
texts.en: Give the low income of teaching, Dogale gave that up and decide to become interested in growing rice and other staple crops. After forty years of experience, she is happy with this work, which is the economic life blood of her family. Money problems slow down the financing of farm work; but with regard to profits, she is planning on expanding the acreage of her arable land in order to see how to increase her revenues and respond without difficulty to life’s experiences each day. The president of the group called “TUJINA”, Dogale is the one holding a notebook in the photo.

loans.use: to pay for transplanting, weeding, crushing of fertilizer, and plant care products

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is 36 years old. She is a married woman and a mother of four children. She has been doing a business of tailoring for many years to support her husband. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

Now she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Parveen hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is 44 years old; she is a married woman. She deals in business, selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase more animals to inflate her sales. 

She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Naira

texts.en:
Naira is a pedagogue with already 32 years of experience in this field. After her graduation from Yerevan State Linguistic University she started her pedagogical occupation and today, she still works at the school as a teacher of Russian language and literature. 

Naira lives in Stepanavan city of the Lori region. She lives with her husband (their children are married and live with their families). Naira likes her profession very much, and she also has 15 pupils at her house in a separated room where she gives private courses of Russian language and literature, preparing them for the entrance exams. 

Naira has a request and great hope that Kiva lenders will help her. She asks for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams for the purchase of a computer and professional literature that she greatly needs in her courses to make them more informative and interesting for her pupils.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and professional literature

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Divorcée et âgée de 39 ans, Ama est une femme qui  habite à Tokoin. Ama s’active personnellement pour gagner son vie et de l’huile rouge embouteillée afin de gagner sa rentabilité. Pour arriver à ses fins, Ama s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché local. Pour commander des bidons d’huile, Ama demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et augmenter son revenu pour favoriser ses charges quotidiennes.
texts.en: Ama, a divorced woman and 39 years old, lives in Tokoin. She is personally active earning her living selling red oil in bottles to make a profit. To achieve her aims, Ama gets her supplies once a month at the local market. To put in an order for containers of the oil, Ama is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to increase her income to cover her day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 14 containers of red oil

loans.name: Augustine

texts.fr: Augustine est une femme mariée de 42 ans qui vit à Tokoin avec ses trois enfants. Augustine est une femme très dynamique et entreprenante qui vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans son quartier. Son commerce lui procure le revenu nécessaire pour répondre favorablement aux besoins quotidiens. Augustine s’approvisionne une fois par mois marché. Augustine demande ce nouveau crédit pour acheter des paniers d’épices et de tomates afin de faire plus de bénéfice et répondre aux attentes de ses clients.
texts.en: Augustine is a 42-year-old married woman who lives in Tokoin with her three children. She is a very energetic and entrepreneurial woman who sells grocery items in her district. Her business brings in the revenues necessary to respond positively to day-to-day needs. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. Augustine is asking for this new loan to purchase baskets of spices and tomatoes in order to make a profit and meet her customers’ expectations.

loans.use: to purchase 40 baskets of spices and 4 baskets of tomatoes

loans.name: Sabou Gnouma Vi Group

texts.fr:
Issa est l’homme qui tient la corde du mouton sur la photo.
Issa  a  55 ans, marié père de huit(08) enfants  âgée de un (01) à vingt-cinq(25) ans, dont  un (01) fréquente l’école coranique.
Il est l’homme de foi, digne et courageux  dans son travail selon la communauté et les membres de son groupe. Sa femme exerce le petit commerce.
Il a trois(03) ans d’expérience d’activité d’éleveur de béliers et chèvres.
Issa s’approuvions dans une foire de sa localité, il solliciter un emprunt au prés de RMCR pour acheter des béliers et chèvres pour bien mener son activité d’élevage. Le bénéfice du prêt lui  permet  d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille (sante, habilement et chaussure).
Dans l’avenir Issa rêve  avoir  des troupeaux pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Issa is the man holding the sheep’s rope in the photo. He is 55 years old and a married father of eight children, aged 1 to 25. of whom one is attending Koran school. Issa is man of faith, dignified, and courageous in his work, according to the community and the members of his group. His wife has a small-scale business. He has three years of work experience raising sheep and goats. 

Issa [gets his supplies] from a fair in his town. He is requesting a loan from the microfinance institution RMCR to purchase some sheep and goats to carry out his livestock business. The profits from the loan enable him to improve his family’s living conditions (healthcare, clothing, and shoes). For the future, Issa dreams of having some herds for his family’s benefit.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and goats to sell later

loans.name: Mawoulawoè

texts.fr: Agée de 40 ans, Mawoulawoè est une femme qui a trois enfants à sa charge. Habitant à Adidogomé, Mawoulawoè est très dynamique et active pour assurer les charges quotidiennes. Mawoulawoè vend des charbons de bois à la devanture de sa maison et réalise un revenu favorable. Mawoulawoè s’approvisionne au marché une fois par mois. Mawoulawoè sollicite ce microcrédit pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois et avoir assez de profits pour permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Mawoulawoè, aged 40, is a woman who has three children to support. Living in Adidogomé, she is very energetic and active ensuring that day-to-day expenses are covered. She sells charcoal in front of her house and makes a favorable income. She gets her supplies at the market once a month. Mawoulawoè is requesting this micro-loan to purchase sacks of charcoal and to obtain enough profit to allow her children a good education.

loans.use: to purchase 25 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is 31 years old. She is a married woman and a mother of four children. She is working hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing, and education.   

She and her husband (also shown in the photo) have been doing agricultural work for some years. They crop different vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

In order to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides, currently Yasmeen has applied for a loan of 30,000 PKR. This would help her to grow more crops which would ultimately help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is 37 years old. She is a married woman who has been doing a business of animal purchase and sales with the help of her husband for many years. Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is a mother of six children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing. 

She has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR. She intends to utilize this loan amount to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers. She is hopeful that her business will generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Afiavi

texts.fr: Afiavi est une femme mariée âgée de 45 ans et vit à Tokoin. Afiavi a trois enfants à sa charge et pour subvenir aux charges de sa famille, Afiavi vend des charbons de bois pour gagner la rentabilité nécessaire pour son épanouissement. Afiavi s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché pour acheter ses provisions. Pour avoir un stock important et maximiser son profit afin d’aider son mari dans l’éducation de ses enfants, Afiavi demande ce prêt pour commander des sacs de charbons de bois.
texts.en: Afiavi is a 45-year-old married woman who lives in Tokoin. She has three children to support. To cover family expenses, she sells charcoal to make the  profit necessary for her development. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. To have a significant stock and to maximize her profit, so as to help out her husband in covering her children’s education, Afiavi is asking for this loan to order sacks of charcoal.

loans.use: to purchase 32 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Eya

texts.fr: Agée de 34 ans, Eya est une femme mariée et mère de trois enfants. Eya vit à Tokoin pour exercer son activité de vente de céréales.  Ce commerce lui permet de venir en aide aux besoins de sa famille et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire. Eya s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des sacs de maïs, Eya demande ce prêt pour acheter sa marchandise et avoir un bénéfice pour éduquer ses enfants.
texts.en: Eya, aged 34, is a married woman and the mother of three. She lives in Tokoin to operate her business selling grains. This business enables her to help out her husband in meeting family needs and to make a good profit margin. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. To order sacks of corn, Eya is asking for this loan to purchase her merchandise and to have a profit for educating her children.

loans.use: to purchase 11 sacks of corn

loans.name: Amivi

texts.fr: Agée de 34 ans, Amivi est une mère de deux enfants et vit dans le quartier de Tokoin. Amivi confectionne des foulards et des chouchous à l’aide des tissus de friperies. Pour gagner son revenu, elle se déplace dans les marchés pour vendre ses réalisations. Amivi s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et réalise une bonne rentabilité avec son activité génératrice de revenu. Amivi nécessite ce crédit pour acheter des tissus avec lesquels elle pourra créer d’autres modèles de chouchou et attirer sa clientèle pour gagner du bénéfice afin de venir en aide à l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en: Amivi, aged 34, is a mother of two children and lives in the Tokoin district. She makes scarves and scrunchies using secondhand materials. To earn her income, she goes from market to market to sell her creations. She gets her supplies once a month at the market and makes a good profit from her revenue-generating business. Amivi has need of this loan to purchase some fabrics with which she will be able to create other styles of scrunchies and to attract customers, so as to earn a profit for helping her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase 28 dozen lengths of fabric

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Issa, c’est l’homme qui tient la corne de Bélier sur la photo. Âgé de 37 ans, Marié, sa femme est une ménagère. Issa n’a pas été à  l’école, c’est un client RMCR depuis 3 ans et il est père de 04 enfants,  deux sont scolarisés, et sont âgés de 11 à 13 ans.
Elle fait cette activité d’embouche ovine depuis plus d’une décennie, et il s’approvisionne dans les marchés d’environnants.
Après la vente son bénéfice peut varier entre 10 000 f à 15 000 f CFA par tête. Avec ses profits il parvient à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille : tel que  la couverture sanitaire, habillements, la scolarisation de ses enfants et alimentaires
Issa est à son cinquième  cycles  et souhaite dans l’avenir avoir plus de fonds afin de pouvoir faire face au bien naître de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Issa is seen in the photo, holding the sheep's rope.  He is 37 years old and his wife looks after their home.  They have four children (aged between eleven and thirteen years), two of their children attend school.  

Issa never went to school.  He has been a client of the field partner, RMCR, for three years and has been rearing sheep for more than ten years now.  He buys his livestock from local markets and makes between 10,000 and 15,000 francs CFA a head when he sells the sheep.  Issa's profits pay for costs such as healthcare, clothing, schooling and food for his family.

This is the fifth loan cycle for Issa and he would like to continue working with RMCR in order to provide for the well-being of his children.

loans.use: to buy sheep for later resale.

loans.name: Nyeta Group

texts.fr:
Samba Baba, c’est l’homme qui tient la corne de bœuf sur la photo. Agé de 51 ans, Marié, sa femme est ménagère. Samba Baba n’a pas été à  l’école, c’est un client du RMCR depuis 2 ans et il est père de 7 enfants,  deux sont scolarisés, les deux enfants scolarisés sont des filles et sont âgées de 10 à 14 ans.
Il fait cette activité d’embouche bovine  depuis quatre ans (4), et il s’approvisionne dans les marchés d’environnants.
Après la vente son bénéfice peut varier entre 20 000 f à 35 000 f CFA par tête. Avec ses profits elle parvient à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille : tel que  la couverture sanitaire, habillements,  la scolarisation de ses enfants et alimentaires.
Samba Baba est à son quatrième  cycles, et il souhaite dans l’avenir avoir plus de fonds afin de pouvoir faire face au bien naître de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Samba Baba is seen in the photo, holding the cow's horn.  He is 51 years old and his wife looks after their home.  They have seven children and two of their daughters (aged ten and fourteen years) attend school.  

Samba Baba never went to school.  He has been a client of the field partner, RMCR, for two years and has been rearing cattle for four years now.  He buys his livestock from local markets and makes between 20,000 and 35,000 francs CFA a head when he sells the cattle.  Samba Baba's profits pay for costs such as healthcare, clothing, schooling and food for his family.

This is the fourth loan cycle for Samba Baba and he would like to continue working with RMCR in order to provide for the well-being of his children.

loans.use: to buy cattle for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various food items for resale.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a Kiva borrower. She has 1 child. She describes herself to be faithful. She operates a retail business where she sells Agrovet products. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of Agrovet products. Her business goal is to open more business outlets within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a stable family.

loans.use: buy more stock of Agrovet veterinary products

loans.name: Anasthasie

texts.fr:
Anasthasie est une femme méticuleuse et travailleuse de 29 ans. Elle est marié et son mari est un artiste, il est chanteur. Ils n'ont pas encore d'enfant. Ils vivent ensemble dans une maison encore en location.
On peut dire qu'Anasthasie aussi est une artiste, elle coude et brode des couvres lits et oreillers, La broderie est manuelle, ce sont des smocks. Elle avait suivi une formation donc , elle possède beaucoup de modèles. Elle possède déjà beaucoup de clients, et tous ses œuvres sont sur commandes. 
Son rêve est de participer à des ventes expositions ou foires organisées par des professionnels pour la faire faire connaître à beaucoup de monde. 
Son objectif est de pouvoir ouvrir un atelier, créer des emplois, ouvrir une une boutique, exporter ses œuvres.
texts.en:
Anasthasie is a meticulous, hard-working, 29-year-old woman.  She is married to a singer and they don't yet have any children.  She lives together with her husband in a rented house.

You could say that Anasthasie is also an artist as she embroiders bed covers and pillow cases.  She does this by hand and uses a lot of smocking techniques.  She trained in this skill and now has many customers who place orders for her work.  Her dream is to take part in exhibitions and professional fairs so she can show off her work to a wider audience.  She would like to be able to open a workshop and shop, employ staff and export her products.

loans.use: to buy satin fabric, thread, ribbons, netting, etc for her business.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en: Parveen  is 45 years old; she is a widow.  She deals in business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute in the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 30000  to purchase more animals to inflate her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en:
Sabina is a married woman with seven children, four of whom attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past three years, she has operated a cereals business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned that seasonality is a factor in the area where she works.

With the 30,000 KES loan, Sabina wants to purchase maize flour, rice, beans, cooking fat, and oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, rice, beans, cooking fat, and oil.

loans.name: Jean Florent

texts.fr:
Jean Florent est un père de famille consciencieux et travailleur infatigable de 40 ans. Père de famille très fier de sa famille et de lui-même, il est marié et père de deux enfants à qui il a donné les meilleures années de sa vie pour se soucier, les protéger et les guider sur le bon chemin.
Jean Florent et sa femme exploitent ensemble l'activité génératrice de revenu de la famille. Il s'agit des confections des tee-shitrs. Ce sont eux qui effectuent tous les travaux: de la coupe jusqu'à la sérigraphie. Ils travaillent pendant plusieurs heures dans une journée: plus de 10 heures. Il était dans ce métier depuis 1994.Il possède donc tant d'années d’expériences.
Son but est de pouvoir ouvrir un atelier, employer des jeunes en quête de travail car l'activité marche très bien et les commandes ne cessent pas d'augmenter.
texts.en:
Jean Florent is forty years old, conscientious and hard-working.  He is married and very proud of his children.  He has given the best years of his life to raise, guide and protect them.

Jean Florent works with his wife to support their family.  They make t-shirts and undertake all the production steps from cutting to printing.  They work for more than ten hours each day and have been doing this since 1994. They, therefore, have many years' experience.  Jean Florent would like to open a workshop and employ young people to respond to the very dynamic market and the ever-growing number of orders they receive.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread for his sewing business.

loans.name: Freddy Noel

texts.es:
Freddy es un joven soñador, responsable y carismático. Actualmente, estudia contabilidad pública y finanzas, desde muy joven se veía trabajando en ello, pues en el colegio estudió una carrera técnica sobre contabilidad y fue ahí donde se enamoró de las áreas contables. Él se siente orgulloso porque recibe el apoyo incondicional de su familia en sus estudios.
Sin embargo, solicita un crédito para pagar las mensualidades de la universidad. Ya que no quiere atrasarse en los aranceles pues podría tener complicaciones a futuro. Él desea trabajar para adquirir experiencia laboral y para ayudarse con los gastos académicos.
texts.en:
Freddy is a young dreamer; he is responsible and charismatic. Freddy is currently studying public finances and accounting and has wanted to work in this area since he was very young. At school, he studied accounting and there he fell in love with the work. Freddy is proud to receive the unconditional support from his family with his studies.

However, Freddy is applying for a loan in order to pay monthly tuition fees at the university. Freddy does not want to be behind in paying his debts as this may cause problems at a later date. Freddy wants to work in order to gain experience and to help cover his university costs.

loans.use: to pay monthly university fees.

loans.name: Las Kantutitas De Bella Vista Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS KANTUTITAS DE BELLA VISTA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Maria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de coca, venta de papa y tunta, venta de zapatos, venta de helados, venta de frutas.
	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Maria es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un asesor que es parte de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá hace un año.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz, tunta, chuño y papa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y  que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “Las Kantutitas de Bella Vista” loan group is beginning its second loan cycle as part of the Panamericana regional office of Pro Mujer. The group has nine members and is run by a board of directors that has María as president. The members have different businesses, including selling meals, selling coca leaves, selling potatoes and freeze-dried potatoes, selling shoes, selling ice creams, and selling fruits.

This loan will benefit small businesses in María’s group. María herself tells us that she joined Pro Mujer one year ago, following an invitation from one of the organisation’s advisors. María currently has a business selling meals; she says that she learned this trade from her mother one year ago.

This loan will be used to increase assets, by buying rice, potatoes, potato starch, and freeze-dried potatoes in bulk from sellers in the city of El Alto. These goods will later be used to prepare and sell meals. This work allows María to earn an income to support her family. María has a partner and two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, María says that she likes the health education offered by the organisation.

loans.use: to buy rice, potatoes, potato starch, and freeze-dried potatoes in bulk.

loans.name: Hélène

texts.fr:
Hélène est une femme débrouillarde et très travailleuse de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et son mari travaille en tant qu'agent de sécurité dans une société et l'aide dans l'exercice de ses activités sources de revenu pendant ses jours de repos. Ils ont deux enfants dont l'un est déjà marié et l'autre étudiant à l'université et qui a encore besoin de leurs soutiens surtout financiers.
Hélène exerce trois activités différentes: fabrication de yaourts maisons, fabrication des pâtes alimentaires et élevage de porc (engraissement).
Cette fois ci, sa demande de prêt est particulièrement pour financer ses besoins dans les deux activités de fabrication alimentaires (pâtes et yaourts).
Actuellement, la construction de leur  propre maison est en cours donc elle a besoin d'augmenter ses revenus. Son désire est de pouvoir finir le plutôt possible cette maison afin de pouvoir vivre confortablement.
texts.en:
Hélène is a self-sufficient, hard-working, 43-year-old woman.  She is married to a man who works as a security agent in a local company.  Her husband helps her with her business on his days off.  Together, they have two children, one of whom is already married and the other is studying at university and remains financially dependent on them.

Hélène has three activities.  She makes yogurt and pasta, and raises pigs.  Her request this time, is to finance her pasta and yogurt making business.

At the moment, Hélène and her husband are building their own house and she, therefore, needs to increase her income.  She would really like to finish construction of their home as soon as possible so they can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, packaging, a pasta machine and a freezer for her food production business.

loans.name: Benkadi   1 Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe BENKADI 1  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  41 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à DIOMBOUGOU, commune de KADIANA, une des sous-préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur dixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est: le riz, l’arachide et le sésame avec KADIATOU la personne au milieu sur la photo position assise. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter: 3,5 hectares. La production est vendue à KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 200 000F cfa qui la permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the 'Benkadi 1' Group are all married women who are, on average, 41 years old and have five children.  They all live in polygamous families in Diombougou in the commune of Kadiana (one of the sub-prefectures of the third administrative region of Mali).

In order to improve their businesses during the winter season, the group works with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso.  This will be their tenth loan.  All the previous loans were fully and correctly repaid.

Kadiatou (sitting in the middle of the photo) grows rice, peanuts and sesame.  She will use her loan to buy supplies and seed and pay for labour costs to work her 3.5 hectares of land.  She sells her produce in Kadiana to both men and women.

Kadiatou expects to make a profit of 200,000 francs CFA which will be used to repay her loan and help her husband with the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and seed, and pay for labour.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a married woman with 2 children. She operates a retail business where she sells milk and she describes herself as capable. She has been involved in this business for 2 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stocks of milk. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: buy more stocks of milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy food ingredients, soft drinks, water, juices and pastries to sell.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
Maria tiene 66 años de edad, es viuda, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de esta comunidad se dedican al comercio y crianza de animales principalmente.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como pollos, gallos, cerdos, patos, entre otros, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en su negocio, ella espera incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria, 66, is a widow and lives with her family in the district of Oyotun.  It is a rural area in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque Region on the northern coast of Peru.  The people of this community work in commerce and livestock farming, mainly.

Maria raises and sells animals including chickens, roosters, pigs and ducks.  She has more than ten years' experience in the business and good personal and work-related references in her district.  Her workplace is set up at home.  The loan she is requesting is to buy more animals to increase her stock in order to have a wider variety and more productivity in her business.  She wants to be able to meet the different demands of her customers in the area to generate more income for a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: To buy more animals to increase her stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy store supplies to sell to customers for more income gain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stock of clothes to sell to his clients.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
Edwin es un hombre de 28 años de edad, vive con su pareja, sin hijos, y su negocio es la artesanía en yeso.
Él es emprendedora, dinámico, constante, comprometido con su trabajo, responsable y muy trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona villa Avaroa, área céntrica caracterizada por albergar a salones de fiestas y talleres automovilísticos. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Edwin es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al mismo negocio. Viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de adobe con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas natural y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la artesanía en yeso; él compra yeso, lo prepara para vaciarlo en moldes. Una ves seco lo pinta y lo empaqueta para su venta. Actividad que realiza durante la semana en su taller propio ubicado en un ambiente de su casa, “el trabajo en yeso es bastante moroso, los materiales son baratos y de fácil acceso…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que la venta es popular y preferida por los niños, la desventaja es la falta de moldes para fabricar nuevos diseños. Su sueño es vender por mayor y exportar, él desea realizar la compra de moldes para la fabricación de alcancías. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que desarrolla esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Edwin solicita un préstamo para la compra de moldes para la fabricación de alcancías para vender por mayor y exportar.
texts.en:
Edwin, 28, lives with his partner and they have no children.  His makes crafts with plaster and is an enterprising, dynamic, consistent, committed, hard-working person.  He works in the area of Villa Avaroa which is a central location known for its celebration halls and auto workshops.  The climate is cold and dry and the daily temperature ranges between 0-12 degrees Celsius.

Edwin has a dark complexion, brown eyes, short black hair, is short in height, has a slim physique and his mother tongue is Aymara which he speaks with the family.  He speaks Spanish for general purposes and in his business.  His partner works in the same business.  They live in an adobe house that belongs to the family.  It has a metal roof and wood floor, with running water, electricity, natural gas and a sewage system.

He is a plaster craftsman.  He purchases the plaster, prepares it for molds and once it dries he paints and packages it for sale.  During the week he works in his own workshop set up at home.  "Working with plaster is calming.  The materials are inexpensive and easy to obtain..." he says.  The advantage of his business is that the products are popular among children.  This disadvantage is a lack of molds for new designs.  

His dream is to sell wholesale and to export.  This is his first loan cycle with the institution in the five years he has been in business.  

Edwin is requesting a loan to buy molds to make piggy banks for wholesale and export.

loans.use: To buy molds to make piggy banks for wholesale and export.

loans.name: Rafael Angel

texts.es: Rafael Ángel, está casado, tiene 49 años y vive con su esposa y sus hijos, con los cuales trabaja en su finca en la producción de granos básicos, como lo son maíz y frijoles ademas produce genjibre, con el crédito quiere comprar insumos como abonos y plaguicidas para fortalecer su plantación de jengibre ademas de comprar semilla para sembrar frijoles y maíz en una parte de su finca que esta vacía, con el fin de aprovechar al máximo sus recursos y de igual forma obtener una mejor y mas grande cosecha con la cual pretende mejorar su condición económica y la de su familia, es su segundo crédito con FUDECOSUR y ha sido excelente cliente, nunca ha tenido crédito con bancos estatales, FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rafael Angel, 49, lives with his wife and children.  They work together on the farm producing basic grains like corn and beans, and also grow ginger.  He plans to use the loan to buy supplies such as fertilizer and pest control agents to strengthen his ginger plantation and also buy seeds to plant beans and corn in the empty part of his farm.  His aim is to maximize his resources for a more productive harvest to improve his family's living conditions.  This is his second loan through FUDECOSUR where he has been an excellent customer.

Rafael Angel has never received a state bank loan and FUDECOSUR is giving him better loan payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer to plant beans, corn and ginger.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, vive con su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia, en su hogar él es la única persona responsable de llevar el sustento diario; se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, desde muy pequeño aprendió junto a su padre a trabajar la tierra, hoy en día es su fuente de ingresos.
Está solicitando un crédito para comprar abono, insecticidas y herbicidas, para cultivar granos básicos, tendrá todo lo necesario para cuando llegue la temporada indicada para sembrar, espera que sus cosechas aumenten así como también sus ingresos.
Sus aspiraciones son aumentar el área de cultivo, cancelar su deuda y abastecer a su familia con una mejor alimentación y vestuario.
texts.en:
Victor lives with his wife and children in his own house.  He is the sole breadwinner in the household and works in agriculture.  He learned farming from his father and now it is his source of income.

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, insecticides and herbicides to plant basic grains.  This way he will have everything he needs on hand when planting season comes.  He is hoping to increase his harvest and income.

Victor's goal is to expand his cropland, pay off debt and provide his family with better food and clothing.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticides and herbicides to plant basic grains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural materials to care for his crops, as well as invest in wood, nails, varnish, glues, etc. to continue working in carpentry.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in agricultural materials such as fertilizer, seeds and herbicide, in order to start the seasonal planting.

loans.name: Claudia Yamileth

texts.es:
Claudia, es dueña de un comedor, está casada, junto a su esposo tiene un hijo de 6 años de edad, el niño es la única persona que depende de ellos, no cuenta con ayuda económica de otras personas. Su negocio lo atiende de seis de la mañana a ocho de la noche, lo emprendió como una forma de llevar el sustento diario a su familia.
Comprará maíz, arroz, frijol, aceite, carnes, verduras, bebidas, etc., al tener la materia prima a su disposición preparara mejor variedad de comida para vender, su principal objetivo es mantener a sus clientes satisfechos y tener un negocio más rentable.
Sus sueños son ampliar su negocio y comprar un vehículo para facilitar sus actividades y compartir paseos con su familia.
texts.en:
Claudia owns a restaurant. She and her husband have a 6 year old son. He is the only person that depends on them, and she doesn't have financial support from other people. Her business is open from six in the morning until eight at night. She opened it to be able to support her family.  

She will buy corn, rice, beans, oil, meat, vegetables, beverages, etc. to have the ingredients available to prepare a better type of food to sell. Her main objective is to keep her customers satisfied and to have a more profitable business.

Her dream is to expand her business and buy a vehicle to facilitate her activities and to go on drives with her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, beans, oil, meat, vegetables, beverages, etc., to have the ingredients available to make a better type of food to sell.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en: Hannah is a married woman with 2 children. She operates a beauty salon where she offers beauty services and she describes herself as determined. She has been involved in this business for 2 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are ladies. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy a stock of beauty products for salon use. She hopes that in the future she will be prosperous. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a stock of beauty products for salon use

loans.name: Klara

texts.ru: Клара, 43 года, замужем, есть сын, ему 20 лет. Образование-высшее. На протяжении 20 лет занимается сельским хозяйством- животноводством и полеводством. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет около 18,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Клары, на сегодняшний день он имеет хорошее хозяйство: 5 коров, 10 овец. На 1,17 Га земли Клара выращивает картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Продает молоко на ежедневной основе. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец и удобрений для полеводства. Клара является лидером группы "Тилектеш", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества дойных коров.
texts.en: Klara is 43 years old, married, and has a 20-year-old son. She has a higher education. For 20 years she has been farming: rearing animals and growing crops. Her monthly income today is about 18,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Klara's hard work, she now has a good farm: five cows and ten sheep. Klara grows potatoes on 1.17 hectares of land for use on the farm and for sale. She sells milk on a daily basis. In order to further develop her business, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy ten sheep and fertilizer for her crops. Klara is the leader of the Tilektesh group which, besides her, comprises another two people. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her herd of dairy cows.

loans.use: to buy ten sheep and fertilizer to treat her land.

loans.name: Symbat

texts.ru: Сымбат, 41 год, замужем, есть 5 детей. Образование-высшее. На протяжении 21 года занимается сельским хозяйством- животноводством и полеводством. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Сымбат, на сегодняшний день она имеет корову и 1,50 Га арендованной земли, где выращивает картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сымбат обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS) на подготовку почвы к полевым работам с целью выращивания экологически-чистых овощей. Сымбат является участником группы "Тилектеш", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в пристройку дома.
texts.en: Symbat is 41 years old, married, and has five children. She has been farming - rearing animals and growing crops - for 21 years. Her monthly income at present is about 15,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Symbat's hard work, she now has a cow and 1.5 hectares of rented land where she grows potatoes for use on the farm and for sale. In order to further develop her business, Symbat has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 10,000 som (KGS) to ready her land for work in the field with the aim of growing organic vegetables. Symbat is a member of the Tilektesh group which, besides her, comprises another two people. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in building an extension to her house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to treat her land and grow organic produce.

loans.name: Ines

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Maputo tem 34 anos de idade, solteira, mãe de 2 filhas menores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha na educação como docente N3 a mais de 8 anos onde ganha o valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Pois enfrentando dificuldades para erguer a sua moradia solícita o empréstimo para adiquiri material de construção como: areia, cimento, chapas e ferro. Este é o seu 8º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende expandir mais no seu serviço e ter uma casa condigna.
texts.en:
She was born in Maputo. She is 34 years old, single, and the mother of two underage daughters who are in school. She does not maintain anyone else.

She has been working in education, as a mid-school teacher, for more than eight years. With what she earns, she covers the home expenses.

Due to difficulties to build her house, she is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, metal sheets and iron. This is her eighth loan from Hluvuku.

In the future, she plans to work more and have a dignified home.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, metal sheets and iron.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гулмира, 38 лет, замужем, есть 5 детей. Образование-высшее. На протяжении 14 лет занимается сельским хозяйством- животноводством и полеводством. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет около 22,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гулмиры, на сегодняшний день она имеет 2 коровы и 8 овец. На 2,0 Га арендованной земли, где выращивает картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) на подготовку почвы к полевым работам с целью выращивания экологически-чистых овощей. Гулмира является участником группы "Тилектеш", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в пристройку дома.
texts.en: Gulmira is 38 years old, married, and has five children. She has a higher education. She has been farming - rearing animals and growing crops - for 14 years. Her current monthly income is about 22,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulmira's hard work, today she has two cows and eight sheep. She also has 2.0 hectares of rented land where she grows potatoes for use on the farm and for sale. In order to further develop her business, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS) to prepare her land for work in the field with the aim of growing organic vegetables. Gulmira is a member of the Tilektesh group which, besides her, comprises another two people. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in building an extension to her house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to treat her land and grow organic produce.

loans.name: Alim

texts.ru: Замечательный человек из Чиликул. Его зовут Алим. Он семейный человек. Ему 45 лет. У него жена, сын, дочка и невестка. Алим дехканин в родном районе.  Раньше он занимался сельскохозяйственной деятельности только для себя и семье. Сейчас он занимается растениеводством. Сейчас Алим занимается растениеводством во дворе. У нее имеется земельный участок для выращивания арбуза. Он после получения богатого и качественного урожая продает на рынке. Сейчас пришло время обработать урожай минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить хороший урожай. Для купли минеральных удобрений у Алим нет денег, и он решил взять кредит. Алим радуется, когда получает богатый и качественный урожай.
texts.en: This wonderful man is from Jilikul. He is called Alim. He is a family man. He is 45 years old. He has a wife, son, daughter, and daughter-in-law. Alim is a farmer in his native area. Previously he engaged in agricultural activity only for himself and his family. Now he grows crops in his yard. He has a plot of land for growing watermelon. After getting a rich and high quality harvest, he sells it at the market. Now the time has come to treat the crops with mineral fertilizer in order to get a good harvest. Alim has no money to buy mineral fertilizer, and has decided to take a loan. Alim will be glad when he gets a rich and high-quality harvest.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like a bag of rice, five gallons of palm oil, etc.

loans.name: Ricardina

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha província de Maputo tem 34 anos de idade, casada oficialmente mãe de 5 filhos menores de idade, apenas 4 frequentam a escola. Responsabiliza-se pelo seu sobrinho que vive em sua casa.
É negociante de venda de roupa usada, onde ganha o valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2012, pois para terminar a sua obra de residência solícita um empréstimo para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedras, chapas e barrotes. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente terminar a sua obra de residência e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior. O seu maior desafio é adquirir uma viatura.
texts.en:
She was born in Namaacha, Maputo province. She is 34 years old, married, and the mother of five underage children. Only four of them go to school. She takes care of her nephew, who lives with her.

She is a businesswoman who sells used clothes. She covers the home expenses with what she earns. She started working with Hluvuku in 2012. She is requesting a loan to finish building her house. She will buy construction materials such as sand, cement, gravel, metal sheets and bars. This is her fourth loan from Hluvuku.

In the future, she plans to finish building her house and make sure her children get a higher-education degree. Her biggest challenge is to buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, gravel, metal sheets and bars.

loans.name: Carlos Brayan

texts.es:
Carlos Brayan es soltero, tiene 26 años de edad, vive en casa familiar, el cuenta con buenas referencias personales por parte de sus vecinos; su comunidad se dedica al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia; y está ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Carlos Brayan se dedica al servicio de transporte en mototaxi en la zona de Cayalti y sus alrededores, desde hace más de 02 años aproximadamente por lo que cuenta con experiencia y con clientes fijos quienes dan buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en el mantenimiento de su mototaxi ya que se encuentra en mal estado, y de esta manera poder asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo ya que es su sustento de vida, con esto el espera mejorar sus ingresos y por ende tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos Brayan is single, 26 years old, and lives in the family home. He has good personal references from his neighbors. His community works in trade, agriculture, and raising animals and is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

Carlos Brayan has worked providing transportation service on his motorcycle taxi in Cayalti zone and nearby areas for over the past 2 years approximately, so he has experience and regular customers who give good personal and work references for him. He asks for the loan to invest in maintenance of his motorcycle taxi since it is in bad shape. In this way he will be able to assure the proper functioning of his work tool since it is his livelihood. With this, he hopes to increase his income with the end of having a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in maintenance on his motorcycle taxi since it is in bad shape.

loans.name: Estela Del Pilar

texts.es:
Estela tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y la venta de ropa, actividad que realiza hace más de 4 años, contando con clientela fija quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El destino del crédito será para invertirlo en la compra de una mayor cantidad de ropa para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto ella espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de ropa a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir mejorar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Estela is 30 years old, partnered, and lives in her own house with her spouse and their two children in La Matanza district. This is a place where the people work in agriculture, raising animals and trade, and is located in Morropón province, Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru. 

She works selling basic items and clothing, work she has done for more than 4 years. She has regular customers who offer very good personal and work references for her. The loan will be used for investing in the purchase of a greater quantity of clothing to increase the stock in her business. With this, she hopes to offer a wider variety of clothing to her customers, which will allow her to increase her income level, with the end of improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of clothing to increase the stock in her business.

loans.name: Ericka Yelixsa

texts.es:
Ericka Yelixsa tiene 26 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y 02 hijos en el caserio San Luis del distrito de Morropón, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio cuenta con servicios basicos como son agua y luz. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla es la venta de abarrotes, actividad que realiza hace más de 06 años, contando con clientela fija. El destino del crédito será para invertirlo en capital de trabajo, pues comprará más productos de primera necesidad para surtir la bodega, lo cual le ayudará a obtener mejores ingresos y ampliar su negocio. Ericka Yelixsa piensa trabajar otorgando productos nuevos y con más bajos precios al de la competencia, lo cual le ayudará a fidelizar a su clientela, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ericka Yelixsa is 26 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and two children in the village of San Luis, Morropón district. Locals work in agriculture, animal farming and commerce. Her home is served with utilities such as water and electricity. Her community is located in the Morropón district, Morropón province, Piura region of the northern coast of Peru.

She sells groceries, and has been doing so for more than six years. She has a fixed customer base. She will use the loan to invest in working capital. She will buy more essential products to stock up her store, which will help her to earn a better income and expand her business.

Ericka Yelixsa plans to offer new products and at lower prices than her competitors’, which will help her to earn the loyalty of her customers. In the short term, this will help her to improve her income and increase her profits, and thus to improve her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy essential products to stock up her store.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: Santiago, tiene 42 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene dos hijos y viven en un sector de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. El siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de maíz y frijoles, y hace 12 años comenzó con el cultivo de café, el cual vende en pergamino y húmedo lo que le genera mayor ingreso. Esta solicitando un segundo ciclo en la institución que es por 10,000 Lempiras para comprar abonos y poder limpiar su finca de café para obtener mejor cosecha. Su plan es seguir cultivando café para darle mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Santiago is 42 years old, lives in a common-law marriage with his wife, with whom he has two children; they live in a sector of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. He always has worked growing corn and beans and 12 years ago, began growing coffee, which he sells in parchment and wet which generates more income. He is asking for his second loan cycle with the institution, which is for 10,000 lempiras to purchase manure and be able to clean his coffee to get a better harvest. His plan is to continue harvesting coffee to give his family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase manure and pay for the cleaning of his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Agua Escondida 12 Group

texts.es:
Francisco es un agricultor de cincuenta años de edad originario del Departamento de La Libertad, pertenece al grupo Solidario conocido por  Agua Escondida 12,sus miembros al igual que Francisco se dedican al cultivo de granos basicos tales como maiz, maicillo, frijol.
Francisco vive junto a su compañera de vida, estudio hasta sexto grado de primaria dado que siempre ha vivido en el area rural,le toco trabajar desde muy temprana edad para ayudar a sus padres que eran de escasos recursos economicos, tiene dos hijas una de 23 años y otra de 20, ambas ya no estudian pues ya tienen su propio hogar.
Francisco siempre ha trabajado la tierra por lo que su experiencia como agricultor es muy amplia y ha sido atravez de dicha actividad que saco adelante a su grupo familiar.
Francisco solicita el Credito para poder cultivar este año 2.5 manzana de maiz y frijol, de esta manera podra asegurar la manuntencion de su familia en el año proximo.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 50-year-old farmer from the department of La Libertad. He belongs to the solidarity group known as Agua Escondida 12 whose members, like Francisco, work cultivating basic grains such as corn, sorghum, and beans.

Francisco lives with his life partner, he went to school up to the sixth grade. Since he has always lived in the rural area, he had to work from when he was very young to help his parents who had limited economic resources. He has two daughters, ages 23 and 20, neither of whom is still studying since they have their own homes. 

Francisco has always worked the land, so his experience as a farmer is very extensive and it has been through this work that he got his family ahead.

Francisco asks for the loan to be able to cultivate 2.5 manzanas of corn and beans this year, in this way he will be able to assure his family's support in the coming year.  Francisco siempre ha trabajado la tierra por lo que su experiencia como agricultor es muy amplia y ha sido atravez de dicha actividad que saco adelante a su grupo familiar.
Francisco solicita el Credito para poder cultivar este año 2.5 manzana de maiz y frijol, de esta manera podra asegurar la manuntencion de su familia en el año proximo.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Jovenes Luchadores Group

texts.es:
El Comité esta conformado en total por 10 jóvenes con aspiraciones sueños y propósitos por lo cual estan dedicando el maximo empeño,ellos quieren poder ayudar a sus familias y sentirse útiles con ello.
Maria hace y vende comida, es una persona muy buena en lo que hace, y es por ello que tiene ya muchos clientes que siempre le hacen muchos pedidos.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar los insumos para hacer sus comidas, como ser: verduras, hortalizas, carne, y otros, y así poder seguir con su lucha diaria.
texts.en:
The committee is made up of a total of 10 young people with aspirations, dreams, and goals for which they are working with the maximum dedication. They want to be able to help their families and feel useful with them. 

María makes and sells food. She is a person who is very good at what she does, and it is for this that she already has many customers who always place a lot of orders. She asks for this loan to be able to purchase supplies to make her dishes, such as vegetables, greens, meat, and more, and in this way be able to continue with her daily struggle.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, greens, meat, and more.

loans.name: Mujeres Valientes Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Valientes está en el ciclo número 6 del programa de Comité de Mujeres, además forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas luchan por ir mejorando la situación de vida de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Rosa, Directora General del Comité, quien en su primera encuesta ya mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha mejorado bastante a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo en la humilde despensa que tiene. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que se esfuerza para poder darle a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener, y evitar que pase por necesidades como las que tuvo que pasar.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos varios para su despensa, como ser verduras, bebidas, panificados, frutas, lácteos y otros, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y esforzándose por su familia.
texts.en:
The group called Mujeres Valientes is in its 6th loan cycle in the program of women's committees. In addition, they are part of the poverty elimination program, where they all struggle to improve the living condition of each one of them. 

One of the members is Rosa, the general director of the committee, who in her first survey already showed a poverty level within level three, which is to say that she has improved quite a bit through her efforts and continuous work in the humble store she has. She is a very hard-working person who strives to be able to give her family everything that she wasn't able to have, and prevent them from having needs like she had.  She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of various supplies for her store, such as vegetables, drinks, baked goods, fruit, dairy products and more, so she can continue with her sales as she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to be able to continue growing and working hard for her family.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, drinks, baked goods, fruit, dairy products, and more.

loans.name: Bavakan

texts.en: Bavakan ended her first Kiva loan and it was great and profitable for her. She hopes that she will manage one more partnership with Kiva and Nor Horizon and again it will be a fruitful and successful deal. She lives in Geghamavan of the Gehjarkunik region. Her two sons are temporally abroad and support their mom by transferring money from there which they earn from doing different construction work. In her farm Bavakan has cows, calves, bulls and chicken. Along with her farm goods (milk, meat and eggs) she also sells her cultivated potatoes, greens, beans, tomatoes and cucumbers. As she says she is greatly satisfied with her potato production which she is serious about further developing it. This time Bavakan wants to use her Kiva loan on the purchase of potato seedlings, fertilizer, diesel fuel and fodder for all her farm cattle.

loans.use: to purchase potato seedlings, fertilizer, diesel fuel and also fodder for all her farm cattle.

loans.name: Jankiz Group

texts.en:
Lolita is the featured borrower of Jankiz group. She joined with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have always been friends since they left their hometown in the Philippines to come to work in Lebanon, for a better income to support their beloved ones back in the Philippines.

Lolita is a 54-year-old married mother of two children who is working hard as a housekeeper to cover the expenses and needs of her beloved kids and improve their living conditions, thus she is acquiring a loan to pay her children's school tuition fees. Lolita is the lady in red. 
With respect to the other group members, Jennifer is the lady wearing a yellow shirt, Karen is the second lady on the left, and Nalyn is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to pay her children's school tuition fees in her home country of the Philippines

loans.name: Azza

texts.en: Azza is 23 years old and from Minia. She is married to a nurse but his monthly income can't cover the family's expenses. Azza requested a loan of 5,000 EGP to buy a different type of sewing machine and cloth to make clothes to sell and for her children.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and some cloth.

loans.name: God's Time Group

texts.en:
This group is made up of six people who are on their four loan cycle with ID-Ghana and from the same area. They share a strong social and professional bond. They are into soap, diapers, toilet rolls, rice, oil, banku (cooked corn and cassava paste), onions, second hand clothing and grocery. 

Susuana aged 35, is the group representative. She is married with three children, two boys and one girl, who are all going to school. She is a service provider in soaps, diapers, and detergents at her residence. She has a good command of this work, having practiced this activity for a long time, therefore has a lot of experience. This new loan will help to buy soaps, diapers, and detergents so that she can serve her customers better. The profits earned help her to look after her children’s needs with respect to food, healthcare, and education.

loans.use: To buy soaps, diapers, and detergents so that she can serve her customers better.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 46 years old, married to Jane and supports a family of 6 children. 

He has been practicing dairy farming for the last 15 years and has been earning 11,500 KES per month. 

Richard has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to buy a dairy cow so as to supply more milk for more income gain. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and to extend his dairy farming. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to supply more milk for more income gain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bales of t-shirts, jackets and sweaters to sell during this rainy season.

loans.name: Simeon

texts.en:
Simeon is a married man, with 5 children and describes himself to be a risk taker. He operates a retail business where he sells flour, detergents, sugar, charcoal and other items. He has been involved in this business for 7 years. His business is located in a strategic place and his primary customers are locals. 

He will use the Kes 80,000 loan to buy more stocks of wheat flour, maize flour, detergents, charcoal. His business goal is to have a bigger shop within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have better living conditions. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to expand the charcoal business.

loans.use: buy more stock of wheat flour, maize flour, detergents, charcoal

loans.name: Margarit

texts.en:
Margarit is 42 years old and she lives in Stepanavan city in the Lori region. She is married and she lives with her husband and two daughters (the elder is a student at the medical institute and the smallest is still at the school). 

Margarit has a higher education and for many years, 25 years already, she has worked at the school as a teacher of informatics.  At her house she also gives private courses in computer skills for some groups of pupils. This loan she asks as she wants to repair the room, where she gives her courses with the pupils, in order to make it more comfortable for them.

loans.use: to repair the room, where she gives privates lessons on computer skills courses with her pupils

loans.name: Musrat

texts.en: Musrat has successfully built her business of milk sales with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. By this time she has attained a good number of customers and makes good amount of income to contribute in the family income. Previously with the help of Kiva she was able to expand her business. Now she has applied a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase another cow to increase her sales to more areas and to gain more profits.

loans.use: to purchase another cow to increase her sales to more areas and to gain more profits.

loans.name: Aliyu

texts.en: Aliyu is a Babban Gona farmer from Jangefe Village. He joined Babban Gona so that he could realise better yields on his farm. Since joining Babban Gona, Aliyu no longer has to worry about having inadequate income to increase his farmland. Through Babban Gona’s input loan he will have access to top of the range farm inputs such as fertilisers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize per hectare: double the national average in Nigeria. This will see him increase his income considerably. This season Aliyu has ambitious plans to harvest 120 bags of maize. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Aliyu now has the opportunity to move into a better home with his family.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase his yields.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 44-year-old married mother of five children. Due to the low financial situation of her husband, she started eleven years ago selling perfumes, cosmetics, and accessories to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family.  Fatima is an ambitious lady and a sacrificing mother, who is working hard to develop her business and improve her family's living conditions. 

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of cosmetics and perfumes for the summer season, as she wants to buy the necessary furniture for her house to make it a better place for her kids. 

Fatima hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with cosmetics and perfumes for the summer and to buy furniture for her house

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 21-year-old single man who started four years ago working in paving to cover his needs and expenses. He was also studying electricity at the institute. 

Ali is an ambitious man and hard worker who dreams of building a successful future. Today, he is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to start his own business as an electrician and to buy the necessary tools. This loan is very important to Ali for it will help him to make a step forward toward his dreams.

Ali hopes to succeed in his business and gain loyal customers with time. He also hopes to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to start his own business as an electrician and to buy the necessary tools

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is 26 years old, married to Virginia and supports a family of 2 children. 

He has been selling timber in the market for the last 3 years earning 9,200 KES per month. 

Vincent has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to buy more timber as stock for sale in order to realize more income. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and to open a retail shop in the area. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more timber as stock for sale.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a 47 year old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and only child. Her husband works as an employee in a company and works also in parallel as a farmer to satisfy the necessities of life and till now he earns a fair revenue. 

That’s why, today, she is requesting a second loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay her child’s educational fees. She said that the loan will surely help her to register him for the coming school year, which makes her very satisfied.

loans.use: to pay her child’s educational fees

loans.name: Armenuhi

texts.en:
Armenuhi is 45 years old and she lives in a pretty village of Ddmashen in Gegharkunik region, where she was born and till now she lives here with her daughter-in-law and with her pretty granddaughter. Her husband and two sons are working abroad now, for better living and income for their family. So in the village Armenuhi with the help of her daughter-in-law, she takes care of the farm where she has cows, calves, heifers, sheep and chickens. 

She has a lot of customers for her farm products who buy them right from her house (milk, cheese, meat and eggs). Land cultivation as she mentions is very hard for her, but since potato cultivation is very profitable for the family, she does it and the harvest she sells to re-sellers. This loan of 700.000 Armenian drams Armenuhi will use for the purchase of potato seedlings, fertilizer and also fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: for the purchase of potato seedlings, fertilizer and also fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a married man. He has 3 children. He describes himself to be focused. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in a competitive place and his primary customers are regular. He will use the 35,000 KES loan to service and maintain his motorcycle. His business goal is to own a public service vehicle within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will own a fleet of vehicles. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to service and maintain his motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase dozens of different types of rubber for her business

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en: Dorcas is a married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself to be trustworthy. She operates a retail business where she sells tomatoes, onions, cabbages and other vegetables. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. She will use the loan of 60,000 KES to buy more stock of vegetables. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Her previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy more stock of vegetables.
